message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.RO 

This paper is likely to belong to the computer vision (cs.CV) and graphics (cs.GR) sub-categories, as it proposes a new spherical image representation that facilitates transferable and scalable 360-degree computer vision. The paper also discusses the use of convolutional neural networks, which falls under the machine learning (cs.LG) sub-category. Additionally, the paper mentions the usefulness of tangent images for traditional computer vision tasks like structure-from-motion and SLAM, which falls under the robotics (cs.RO) sub-category.
